abstract: Human Rights Watch reports that Iraqi militias and security forces destroyed and looted property of Sunni civilians after retaking town of Amerli from Islamic State in 2014; group calls for vigilance in ensuring that operations against Islamic State do not give rise to other abuses.
lead_paragraph: The victorious forces, which took back territory from ISIS militants with the help of U.S.-led airstrikes, carried out raids in dozens of towns, Human Rights Watch said.

headline.main: Iraqi Forces and Militias Said to Loot Sunni Towns
